definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

pinyin: Mi4 ke4 luo2 ni2 xi1 ya4

definition: Galicia, province and former kingdom of northwest Spain

pinyin: Yin4 du4 ni2 xi1 ya4 yu3

sentences.english: Thailand, Malaysia and the Philippines are considering new price controls or subsidies.
sentences.chinese: 泰国，马来西亚以及菲律宾都在考虑价格控制和补贴。

sentences.english: Perak, Malaysia is currently the police are stepping into the cause.
sentences.chinese: 目前马来西亚霹雳州警方正在加紧调查事故的原因。

sentences.english: The first Sudirman Cup competition was held in indonesia in 1989 .
sentences.chinese: 第一苏迪曼杯赛正在印度僧西亚于1989年进行。

sentences.english: An open war between Sweden and Russia broke out in 1554.
sentences.chinese: 1554年，瑞典同露西亚公开爆发战争。

sentences.english: In 1960 Khruschev headed a delegation to visit Indonesia and was royally treated by his host.
sentences.chinese: 率团出访印度尼西亚，他受到了主人的盛情款待。

sentences.english: In Malaysia, officials have warned Muslims against celebrating.
sentences.chinese: 在马拉西亚，官方已经警告过穆斯林要反对庆祝了。

sentences.english: She grew up in Zimbabwe, or Rhodesia as it then was.
sentences.chinese: 她生长在津巴布韦，当时该地叫罗得西亚。

sentences.english: The pictures show the statistics of China's investment and the project-contracting cooperation in West Asia.
sentences.chinese: 图为中国对西亚投资及承包工程合作统计。

sentences.english: In that year, the Council of Nicaea was convened by emperor Constantine.
sentences.chinese: 在那些年里，康斯坦丁大帝组建了尼西亚理事会。

sentences.english: Karina and Cynthia are talking in Da-an Park.
sentences.chinese: 卡丽娜和辛西亚在大安森林公园聊天。

sentences.english: Flying Gecko The flying gecko lives in the Malaysian rainforest.
sentences.chinese: 飞行壁虎生活在马来西亚的雨林中。

sentences.english: On the same day Wen also met with former Malaysian Prime Minister Dr. Mahathir bin Mohamad.
sentences.chinese: 同日，温家宝还会见了马来西亚前总理马哈蒂尔。

sentences.english: In the eighteenth year of the reign of Josiah was this passover kept.
sentences.chinese: 这逾越节是约西亚作王十八年守的。

sentences.english: The first woman in Malaysia to head a university, Tan Sri Ng was the founding President of Universiti Tunku Abdul Rahman (UTAR).
sentences.chinese: 黄博士是马来西亚大学历来第一位女性校长。

sentences.english: Silat is a unique martial art originating from the archipelago. The most popular sports in Indonesia are soccer and badminton.
sentences.chinese: 印度尼西亚最受欢迎的体育项目是足球和羽毛球。

sentences.english: Lucia was shopping when she suddenly bumped into her old friend Debra.
sentences.chinese: 露西亚购物时碰上了老朋友黛布拉。

definition: Sudan/sultan (ruler of some Muslim states, esp. Ottoman Emperor)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
